typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Counters.Counter storage pointer) view returns (uint256)
function (struct Counters.Counter storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

mintToken(uint256,string,address).details: Function to create and mint tokens

params.to: The address that will receive the minted tokens.
params.tokenURI: Address of NFT MetaData which is stored on IPFS

returns._0: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

mintTokenToManyUsers(uint256,string[],ad.details: Function to mint tokens for Many Users

params.to: The address that will receive the minted tokens.
params.tokenURI: Address of NFT MetaData which is stored on IPFS

returns._0: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.
